terms.youAgreed: You have agreed to terms and conditions and our privacy policy
terms.continue: By continuing to use the app, you confirm to have read
terms.termsAndServicesContent:
1. Our service. Fastfill’s service is to help customers pay for fuel via secure electronic payments. 
2. User’s payment info. FastFill does not save customers payment information or credit card info unless the user grants permission.
3. Users have the option of saving their payment info whether card or account numbers. By saving their payment info, users will have a faster experience of topping up their accounts. By choosing the add card and save options, users are giving FastFill the permission to save their card number(PAN) in the app for a faster account refilling experience.
4. The add card and save options does not require the iPIN number, it is only a way to make the credit card number in handy for a better and faster account refilling experience.
5. Refund policy. FastFill does not offer refunds after users pay a gas station. If the user has topped up their FastFill account with an incorrect amount, the user may contact FastFill through the WhatsApp number provided in the app in order to solve the issue. The user should except FastFill to respond within two business days.
6. Fees. FastFill takes a fee from every transaction between users and gas stations. That fee is subject to change in the future.
7. Technical support. In case of technical difficulties experienced by users, users should contact FastFill through the WhatsApp number provided by the app. Users must allow two business days for FastFill to acknowledge the issue and respond.
8. Account hacking. In the case of a user’s account being hacked, FastFill will do its best to recover the account to its owner but it must be stated that FastFill is not responsible or liable for hacked accounts or the amount of money in those accounts.
terms.privacyPolicyContent:
1- user’s account info
FastFill will never share any information of its users and their accounts unless granted permission by the specific user.
terms.dataContent: FastFill will never share any of its data or users data to any party. FastFill will also never sell any of its data or users data or information.
terms.youSuccessfullyAgreedTerms: You have successfully agreed Fast fill terms and services
